title: Justice Dept. Will Monitor Sites in 24 States for Voting Rights Violations
description: The number of states under scrutiny rose by six under the Biden administration, with a new focus on battleground suburban counties.
dc:creator: Glenn Thrush

media:content.media:credit: Caitlin O'Hara for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: The Maricopa County Elections Department in Phoenix has added fencing for the 2022 election cycle.
